event.description: A commit message implied an update, confirmation, or superseding of Proof 524 values after anchoring, but no proof or CID files were changed.

actions.corrective_action: Record the incident in governance issues; no changes to proof or cid artifacts are required.
actions.preventive_action: When no files change, use verification-only wording such as 'verification only (no data change)' instead of 'update' or 'confirm'.
